title: Ward skin disappeared from my account.
body:
I was changing my ward skins and I was trying to find my ginger bread ward. It was just gone, **POOF** not even there. I bought it when all the special little wards were on the shop, penguin skier, riggle ward, etc. Now I don't even have my favorite one. If someone could help me get it back or maybe this is an issue on my end, please help. 

I looked through my purchase history and it only goes back 3 months so I couldn't find when I bought it and I don't know if there is an option to see your full purchase history. Thanks to anyone who can help.

replies.body: There's an issue on-going currently where some ward skins are missing despite being unlocked on the account.  There's no eta on a fix for this right now.  Looking into your specific issue, I am happy to say all of the ward skins you mentioned are still on your account.  I hope that helps put you at ease!
i'm bit pissed off cuz, I can't even count the number of disappeared ward skins which are not attainable by now.
Missing season 3 victorious and gong ward, but still have heartseeker ward.
I just want my battlecast ward back ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­

i have just a bit of a different issue. i cant change mine. the area next to the summoner spells where the wards are to be, just isnt there. it is just a blank spot that can not be clicked.  all in due time i guess, but the comment above, where there is no eta for the fix is a bit disheartning. i disenchanted 2 skins to unlock my wardskin, and one was a "bluegem" or something. rarish i believe, and would have saved it, if i knew i was going to have to wait for the ward  skin. i would have unlocked more common ones by the time it comes back
i also am missing quite a few ward skins
missing 1 ward skin, my season 3 victorious ward skin is gone  :/
2 of my ward is missing :( mehhh
I have the same, i have 2 ward skins, SKT T1 and the poro ward, once i used the poro skin because i just got it from a chest, when i used it the SKT T1 skin was gone.
I'm missing 8 wards ;3; it is nawt fun QQ

I'm having the same issue, too! I'm at least missing my Bouquet ward and either spider or tomb stone ward. I own 9 (not including the free ward) with two missing. >3< Bouquet is one of my favorites, too. Ahhh!
